content.prompt: Between 1870 and 1914, the heavily industrialized nations of Western Europe earned the loyalty of their citizens by all of the following EXCEPT

choices.label: extending the right to vote to almost all adult males
acquiring colonies to promote economic expansion and national pride

topic.text: 6.10: Causation in the Age of Industrialization

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
